original_text: And the winepress was trodden without the city, and blood came out of the winepress, even unto the horse bridles, by the space of a thousand and six hundred furlongs.
korean_text: 성 밖에서 그 틀이 밟히니 틀에서 피가 나서 말 굴레에까지 닿았고 천육백 스다디온에 퍼졌더라

sentences.original_text: And the winepress was trodden without the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 포도주 틀이 성 밖에서 밟혔고

sentences.original_text: and blood came out of the winepress
by the space of a thousand and six hundred furlongs
